p.k: "Hello, Counselor" is a talk show with an emphasis on people and their stories, regardless of their age or gender to concerns that are too embarrassing to reveal! The purpose of this program is to help take down communication barriers by sharing stories about life. Comedians Shin Dong-Yeob, Jeong Chan Woo, Kim Tae Kyun, and Lee Yeong Ja are the hosts of this program with various special guests appearing on the show weekly.
